author: Reuters Editorial
title: More room for opening up in China's financial sector: central bank governor
text:
May 29, 2018 / 3:40 AM / in an hour More room for opening up in China's financial sector: central bank governor
BEIJING (Reuters) - There is more room for opening up in Chinaâ€™s financial sector, central bank governor Yi Gang said on Tuesday, adding that financial regulators need to strengthen supervision of the sector. FILE PHOTO: People's Bank of China (PBOC) Governor Yi Gang speaks at a panel at the Boao Forum for Asia in Qionghai, Hainan province, China April 11, 2018. China Daily via REUTERS
The central bank governor made the remarks at an annual conference in Beijing. Reporting by Beijing Monitoring Desk; Editing by Jacqueline Wong
